document_data.name: Second battle of Shadowdale
document_data.mainbody: The '''second battle of Shadowdale''' (often referred to as simply the '''battle of Shadowdale''') was a battle fought in [[Shadowdale]] within the [[Dalelands]] in [[1358 DR]], between the defending forces of the Dalelands, and troops from [[Zhentil Keep]], led by [[Bane]].
